casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v L. M., Appellant.

[— NYS2d —]

Motion by the appellant to amend the caption of the above-entitled appeal to provide for the anonymity of the appellant and to seal the record on appeal, including all briefs filed on the appeal.

Upon the papers filed in support of the motion and the papers filed in relation thereto, it is

Ordered that the motion is granted and the caption of the appeal has been amended accordingly. O’Brien, J. P., Ritter, Pizzuto and Altman, JJ., concur.
